channel.title: Comments on: Elixir of the Convenience Store Gods

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: My wife and I watch the <a href="http://travel.discovery.com/fansites/stranded/stranded.html" rel="nofollow">Stranded with Cash Peters Show</a> on the Travel Channel sometimes. There was this one episode where he was dropped off in the middle of Tokyo. One of the stores he walked into was this place filled with all kinds of crap that people just had to have. Not stuff that was really valuable but just cheap crap that the people there just love to snap up. This commercial reminds me of that place.
item.content:encoded: My wife and I watch the Stranded with Cash Peters Show on the Travel Channel sometimes. There was this one episode where he was dropped off in the middle of Tokyo. One of the stores he walked into was this place filled with all kinds of crap that people just had to have. Not stuff that was really valuable but just cheap crap that the people there just love to snap up. This commercial reminds me of that place.
